summary.Title: Tandoori Dehra in Valby is Hiring Experienced desi Tandoori Chefs
summary.JobHeadline: Tandoori Dehra in Valby is Hiring Experienced desi Tandoori Chefs

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Tandoori Dehra in Valby is Hiring Experienced desi Tandoori Chefs
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job Advertisement: Tandoori Dehra is Hiring Experienced Indian Tandoori Chefs in Valby  

CVR: 36556234  

Are you passionate about authentic Indian cuisine and experienced in preparing tandoori dishes? At Tandoori Dehra in Valby, we are looking for two skilled and experienced chefs to help us deliver exceptional flavors to our guests.  

About the Job  
As a chef at Tandoori Dehra, your primary responsibilities will include:  
- Preparing traditional tandoori dishes, including naan, kebabs, curries, and other Indian specialties.  
- Operating and managing the tandoor oven to ensure dishes are cooked to perfection.  
- Maintaining high standards of food quality, flavor, and presentation.  
- Assisting in menu development and introducing innovative Indian-inspired dishes.  
- Ensuring cleanliness and compliance with health and safety regulations in the kitchen.  

Requirements  
We are looking for candidates who:  
- Have proven experience as a tandoori chef or in Indian cuisine.  
- Are proficient in using a tandoor oven and preparing authentic Indian dishes.  
- Have a solid understanding of Indian spices and traditional cooking methods.  
- Can work efficiently in a team and handle busy kitchen operations.  
- Can communicate in English (knowledge of Hindi, Punjabi, or Urdu is a plus).  

What We Offer  
- A competitive salary based on experience and skills.  
- A welcoming and dynamic work environment.  
- An opportunity to be part of a restaurant that values authenticity and quality.  

How to Apply  
If you have the experience and passion for Indian cuisine that we are looking for, we would love to hear from you.  

Please send your CV and a brief cover letter to job@vejentil.dk  

Join Tandoori Dehra and help us bring the rich flavors of India to Valby. We look forward to welcoming you to our team.
